name: The Three Charms - Lonesome Spirit
description:
Battles have no "Fight" commands.
In this oneshota roleplaying game, your only choice is to escape!

The enemy spirits are beautiful women trying to allure you with
charms and hypnosis, and other status-changing effects.
If you get caught, you'll feel the full brunt of their assault, and finally...

Plenty of sweet allurements are waiting to catch you on the map,
and if you fall for them, your time of corruption will draw near...

[Story]

Long, long ago, there was a
there was a young exorcist named Byakunen.
One day, he found himself lost in a mysterious world, and ended up in a battle
with female spirits on his way to the sea.

These are cum-sucking spirits with strange bodies and unknown seduction techniques.
The boy summons his courage, and tries to resist them!
